item.content:encoded:
Shrink Tunnel Machine

We are the leading manufacturer and exporter of the best quality Shrink Tunnel Machine. Our dexterous experts manufacture this machine using quality approved materials and advanced technology in tandem with industry standards. This machine is used for packaging cosmetic products, toys, and beverages. Clients can easily purchase this Shrink Tunnel Machine from us at marginal prices with no hassle.

Features:

  • Long functional life
  • User-friendly operation
  • Unmatched performance

Technical Specifications

Model PP 3015S PP 3020S PP 4515S PP 4525SS
Tunnel Size (WxH) mm 250×150 300×200 400×250 450×250
Voltage (V/Hz) 220/50 220/50 220/440/50 220/440/50
Power Consumption (KW) 3.2 4 6.2 6.6
Conveyor Loading (Kg) 15 15 20 20
Heating Furnace (mm) 800x300x150 800x300x200 900x450x150 900x450x250
Overall Dimension (mm) 1150x560x1170 1150x560x1220 1200x610x1000 1200x610x1000
Speed (m/min) 0-10 0-10 0-10 0-10
Heating Time (minutes) 5 5 10 10
Cooling Time (minutes) 15 15 15 15
Net Weight 100 120 150 160

item.title: Flow Wrap Packaging Machine
item.dc:creator: zarainternational
item.description:
Brand: Zara International

  • Features:

    • Space-efficient design
    • Top Class performance
    • Longer working life

The post Flow Wrap Packaging Machine appeared first on Zara International- Pouch Packing Machine, Food Processing Machine.
item.content:encoded:
Flow Wrap Packaging Machine

We have established an enormous customer base in the national as well as in the foreign markets by producing and supplying top quality of Flow Wrap Packaging Machine. The given machine is completely constructed by our organization in adherence to set industry benchmarks.

Also, this machine is assessed by our quality control team on various criteria before dispatching. Besides this, we can mainly use the provided Flow Wrap Packaging Machine for packaging the materials like chocolates, toffee, candies, bread, biscuits, ice cream, sweets etc.

 

These horizontal flow wrapping machines are absolutely best suitable for packing varied items. This range of horizontal flow wrap machine is noiseless and provides hassle-free operation. They are used to wrapping a diverse range of materials like chocolates, toffee, candies, bread, biscuits, ice cream, sweets, automotive parts, soap, cake, candy, bearing, and instant noodles. We also offer these Horizontal Flow Wrap Machines in the various customized specifications, as per the client’s requirements.

Features:

  • Space-efficient design
  • Top Class performance
  • Longer working life

Applications

Food industry Toffee, Candies, Cakes, Confectionery, Chocolates, Candles, etc.
Pharma & medicine Industry Catheters, I.V Bottles, Syringes, hand gloves, Medicines, Diapers, etc.
Engineering & Automotives screws, spare parts, Bearing, electrical & electronic parts.
Other Industries Audio/CD, Stationery, Pencils, Sharpeners, Bopp Tapes, Educational Packs, Magazines, Credit Cards, etc.

item.content:encoded:
BAG FILLING MACHINE

We are the driving builders and supplier of a supreme quality range of Bag Filling Machines. These machines are manufactured by our unit using optimum quality materials in accordance with set industry standards.

We can use this for filling the materials at top running speed in chemical and food processing industries. Furthermore, our precious customers can avail of this Bag Filling Machine at reasonable prices in diverse technical specifications.

Riding on impenetrable volumes of industrial proficiency, we are offering an extensive range of Bag Filling Machine. Broadly employed in various material filling applications, this machine is highly efficient and packed with high utility features.

It is manufactured under the guidance of our adroit engineers using well-tested components that are procured from the reliable vendors of the market and sophisticated technology. All of our machinery is rigorously tested on various parameters by our quality auditors in order to provide flawless machine at clients’ end. We provide this machine in various models and specifications as per requirements at a market competitive price.

Features:

  • Long service life
  • Robust design
  • Excellent durability
  • High operational fluency
  • Require less maintenance
  • Smooth functioning
